      • getAdminTickets

        public List<Ticket> getAdminTickets(Integer limit)
                             throws PiikDatabaseException,
                                    PiikInvalidParameters
        This function allows the admins to retrieve the current unresolved tickets
        Parameters:
        limit - maximum number of tickets to retrieve
        Returns:
        the list of all the tickets which haven't been closed
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException - Thrown on query gone wrong
        PiikInvalidParameters - Thrown if limit is equal or less than 0

      • getUserTickets

        public List<Ticket> getUserTickets(User user,
                                   Integer limit)
                            throws PiikDatabaseException,
                                   PiikInvalidParameters
        This function allows an user to retrieve his open tickets
        Parameters:
        user - whose tickets will be retrieved
        limit - maximum number of tickets to retrieve
        Returns:
        the list of all the tickets which haven't been closed
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException - Thrown on query gone wrong
        PiikInvalidParameters - Thrown if limit is equal or less than 0
